Articles.Content:
I accepted a mission to safe Jebsel Kerman and decided to first accomplish a rendezvous with his craft.

When Valentina was in the Venus 9 and accomplished a rendezvous with Jebsel's stranded craft Jebsel reported that he only had 2 hours of oxygen and 2 hours of electricity left until the last backups would be depleted.

you can view the rescue mission with pictures here:

[url]http://imgur.com/a/C6AAJ[/url]
What life support mod do you use?

[quote name='NotAgain']What life support mod do you use?[/QUOTE]

[URL="https://www.google.com/url?sa=t&rct=j&q=&esrc=s&source=web&cd=1&cad=rja&uact=8&ved=0ahUKEwiN-bCQyqTJAhUW1WMKHdBsBeQQFggdMAA&url=http%3A%2F%2Fforum.kerbalspaceprogram.com%2Fthreads%2F40667-1-0-2-TAC-Life-Support-v0-11-1-20-5Apr&usg=AFQjCNHzcUDPS93xEG5We4Dc-bUW2HorGg&sig2=JbYQ3XVjsbYv1yUztDsMSQ&bvm=bv.108194040,d.cGc"]That's TAC Life Support[/URL]
